title: Looking for Alaska
comment:
Just wow. John Green hold me with his writing. There were times when I could predict what was going to happen next but the excellent narration kept me going. It was an easy read, took me 2 days to finish it up. 
 When I finished it, I had a sense of unfulfillment. That life is so, ephemeral. She just took off and, POOF, gone. Just like that.

title: Outliers
comment: This makes you think differently about success and life in general. Whatever that is going on is a part of something big. This isn't secret of success, but, would make you reason a lot of things.

title: Cosmos
comment: Carl Sagan is a genius indeed. He can start a chapter with a story from mainland in china and end on human evolution, while taking you back and forth in deep intergalactic ocean. When you complete this book, you'll have this sense of fulfillment.

title: Hyperbole and a Half
comment: What a book. It's a light read. You'll finish this in 3 hour tops. Fun Fact: I finished this book while on a flight. Everybody kept looking at the book because it looks like a comic. You won't regret giving it a read.

title: Hitchhicker's Guide to the Galaxy
comment: MOST AWAITED BOOK OF THE YEAR
